---
name: "Feature Request"
about: Propose a new lead source or a SaaS-readiness feature.
title: "[FEATURE] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
---

## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? (e.g., "We need more B2B data from niche directories").

## Proposed Solution
Describe the new lead source or functionality (e.g., "Add a YellowPages scraper module").

## Commercial/SaaS Impact
How does this align with the future monetization roadmap (Stripe, CRM Sync, etc.)?

## Requirements
- [ ] New Playwright stealth logic for the target site.
- [ ] Updated GPT-4o prompt to handle new search parameters.
- [ ] Frontend tab for the new lead source.
